privateKeyHelp: Open the downloaded private key file and copy just the key starting with -----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
serviceAccountEmailHelp: the emailaddress of the service account
spreadsheetIdHelp: You can find the id in the URL of your spreadsheet.
defaultSpreadsheetAliasHelp: Set this as the default spreadsheet
